title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper. Simple, rich, and delicious.
instructions: Toss pasta with meat, remove from heat, quickly mix in egg mixture to create a creamy sauce.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth, buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy. An Indian-inspired favorite.
instructions: Stir in cream and grilled chicken.
Simmer until sauce thickens and serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetarian Chili
summary: A hearty and flavorful vegetarian chili packed with beans, vegetables, and a rich blend of spices. Perfect for a cold day.
instructions: Add spices and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in beans and crushed tomatoes.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes.
Serve with toppings like sour cream and cheese.
